header.m.c.c: #app > div > header > div:nth-child(3) > main > div:nth-child(3) , #app > div > header > div:nth-child(4) { color: $d!important; }

header.m.bg.c: #app > div > header > div:nth-child(3) > main > div:nth-child(3) , #app > div > header > div:nth-child(4) { background: $d!important; }

header.m.ic.c: #app > div > header > div:nth-child(3) > main > div:nth-child(3) > div > span:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1)> span , #app > div > header > div:nth-child(3) > main > div:nth-child(3) > div > main > div > span > span , #app > div > header > div:nth-child(4) > span:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > span , #app > div > header > div:nth-child(4) > div > main > div > span > span { color: $d!important; }

body.bg.c: body , #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > main > main > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > main > div:nth-child(1) , #app > div > div:nth-child(3) , #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > main > main > div > div { background: $d!important; }

problem.c.c: #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > main > main > div > div { color: $d!important; }

problem.uic.c: #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > main > main > main { color: $d!important; }
problem.uic.n: 문제 설명 아이콘 & 글씨 색 [ex : 메모리 제한]

cat.bg.c: #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > main > div:nth-child(2) { background: $d!important; }

cat.c.c: #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > main > div:nth-child(2) { color: $d!important; }
cat.c.n: 카테고리 이름 글씨 색 or 문제 이름 글씨 색

cat.ic.c: #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > main > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > span , #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > main > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > span , #app > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > main > div > div > main > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > span { color: $d!important; }

progress.notfilled.n: Progress Bar 채워지지 않은 곳의 색
